title: To whomever is in charge of the Udyr rework
body:
I just wanna say thank you. 

I appreciate the fact we're not just going with a rushed approach, and that you're taking the time to measure it out properly. One of the things i've always respected about Blizzard is the time they take to put out content that's above the usual, and i respect you guys for taking a similar approach in this regard.

I know it doesn't mean much from a lowly pleb such as myself, but you guys are doing awesome. Thank you so much and have a wonderful day ;)

Cheers.
